name: libvdpau_va_gl
desc:
The libvdpau-va-gl package contains a library which implements 
the VDPAU library. Libvdpau_va_gl uses OpenGL under the hood to 
accelerate drawing and scaling and the VA-API (if available) to 
accelerate video decoding. For now VA-API is available on some 
Intel chips, and on some AMD video adapters with the help of 
the libvdpau driver.
